content.en: Image watermarking: Researchers are exploring the capabilities of various algorithms in the field of image watermarking. They are investigating whether algorithms such as halftoning techniques, neural networks, and discrete cosine transform can provide image content authentication, localization, and recovery. Additionally, they are studying the effectiveness of algorithms like deep learning and convolutional neural networks in improving the imperceptibility and robustness of digital image watermarking. These studies aim to enhance the security and protection of digital images.
content.da: Billedvandmærkning: Forskere udforsker kapaciteterne af forskellige algoritmer inden for billedvandmærkning. De undersøger, om algoritmer som halvtone-teknikker, neurale netværk og diskret cosinustransformation kan tilbyde billedindholdsgodkendelse, lokalisation og gendannelse. Derudover studerer de effektiviteten af algoritmer som dyb læring og konvolutionelle neurale netværk i at forbedre usynligheden og robustheden af digital billedvandmærkning. Disse studier sigter mod at øge sikkerheden og beskyttelsen af digitale billeder.
